Function reference

Data Model

data_etl()
Main data ETL

HTML Widgets

Custom HTML and Highchart widgets to render WA+ variables and time-series.

bs_themed()
Custom Bootstrap theme
accordion() accordionItem() updateAccordion()
Bootstrap 4 accordion
scoreBox()
Scorecard Box
boxplot_ecc()
Boxplot yearly ECC time-series (highcharts)
plot_bullet()
Plot bullet charts
plot_clim()
Plot dekadal index time series (highcharts)
plot_cor()
Plot correlation matrix (highcharts)
plot_ecc()
Plot yearly ECC time-series (highcharts)
plot_ecc_density()
Plot yearly ECC density (highcharts)
plot_idx()
Plot yearly index time series with EMA trends (highcharts)
plot_idx_density()
Plot index density (highcharts)
plot_idx_mosaic()
Plot temperature indices (highcharts)
plot_rcp()
Plot product recipes (highcharts)
plot_tick()
Plot payout curves (highcharts)
plot_timeline()
Plot monthly basin time series (highcharts)
plot_ts()
Plot variable time-series
hc_themed()
Custom HighCharts theme
hc_ts()
Plot dekadal index time series with trends (highcharts)
